game.name: Tabletop Game Shop Simulator
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Color Alternatives, Adjustable Difficulty, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 나만의 테이블탑 게임 스토어를 운영하세요! 선반을 채우고, 미니어처를 조립 및 도색하고, 게임의 밤에는 손님과 함께 배틀을 벌이고, 궁극의 덕후 천국으로 가게를 성장시키세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Run your own tabletop game shop! Stock shelves, glue & paint minis, battle customers on game night, and grow your store into the ultimate nerd paradise.
